title: Lima City in 1 day - Lima Highlights! (Small Group)
description: Discover the highlights of Lima in one day with this small-group guided tour. Visit top attractions and neighborhoods, such as Miraflores, San Isidro, and Barranco, and the Park of Love, Plaza San Martin, Plaza Mayor, and Museum of San Francisco and its catacombs, with a guide to provide historical context and insights.
all_descriptions: Discover the highlights of Lima in one day with this small-group guided tour. Visit top attractions and neighborhoods, such as Miraflores, San Isidro, and Barranco, and the Park of Love, Plaza San Martin, Plaza Mayor, and Museum of San Francisco and its catacombs, with a guide to provide historical context and insights.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:El Parque del Amor, Malecon Cisneros 18, Lima PeruAfter picking you up, we visit this beautiful park inaugurated in 1993 and it celebrates “love”. At its center, an iconic sculpture “The Kiss” made by the Peruvian artist Victor Delfin, depicts lovers embracing in an endless kiss.Duration: 20 minutesStop At:Huaca Pucllana, Calle General Borgono s/n, cuadra 8, Lima 15074 PeruThen, we see this ancient archaeological site, adobe pyramidal construction built between 200 and 700 AD, representing a ceremonial and administrative area for Lima Culture.
We visit Huaca Pucllana only from the exterior, we do not enter.Duration: 15 minutesStop At:San Isidro, Lima 15073 PeruAfter, we go to see the preserved olive trees, that date several hundred years. There are also exhibits of old machinery used in the production of olive oil in ancient times, plenty of greenery and an ornamental pond stocked with fish and turtles.Duration: 20 minutesStop At:Barranco, Lima PeruThen, we go to The Artsy neighborhood of Lima. Be amazing by its beautiful murals that make Barranco such a colorful and trendy place. Also, make a wish at “The Bridge of Sighs”.

LUNCH: at midday there will be a break of 1 hour 30 minutes so you can have lunch. We will recommend you some good local restaurants.Duration: 1 hourStop At:Plaza San Martin, Av. Nicolas de Pierola cdra. 9, Lima 15001 PeruIn the second part of the tour, we visit this Plaza made in 19 hundred to commemorate 100 years of Peruvian independence. The surrounding buildings are great, displaying Neoclassic style.Duration: 30 minutesStop At:Plaza de Armas (Plaza Mayor), Jr. Junin and Jr. Carabaya, Lima PeruThen, we will go to the Main square, the most representative one in Peru where you will see impressive buildings such as “The Presidential Palace”, “The City Hall of Lima”, “The Cathedral” and The Archbishop’s Palace”, etc.Duration: 30 minutesStop At:Museo Convento San Francisco y Catacumbas, Jiron Ancash, Lima 15001 PeruFinally, we will take you to the most interesting museum in downtown Lima. Your expert guide will explain you here about the rich history of Peru’s capital. Explore the underground Catacombs!Duration: 1 hour

8 contributions

Excellent service.

Jul 2025 • Couples
Lucas was a great tour guide. He was very engaging and highly knowledgeable about the history and the important details regarding each place we went to today. His English was clear and easy to understand, and his responses to questions were really good and thoughtful. He would be high on the recommendation list to others desiring to do this tour.
Written July 25, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

reviews.title: Excellent service.
reviews.text: Lucas was a great tour guide. He was very engaging and highly knowledgeable about the history and the important details regarding each place we went to today. His English was clear and easy to understand, and his responses to questions were really good and thoughtful. He would be high on the recommendation list to others desiring to do this tour.

reviews.title: Super indicate the tour
reviews.text: We loved the tour, especially the tour of old Lima. The capital surprised us with its cleanliness, organization and history. The guide Alexandra Monzón, runs too much in her explanations, knowledge and language exchange (speaking Portuguese perfectly).

reviews.title: A highly recommended tour if you want something more personalized and visit Lima's most iconic sites.
reviews.text: Our guide, Pamela, was very pleasant, knowledgeable about history, and made the tour an unforgettable experience.

reviews.title: Excellent tour, well run
reviews.text: Excellent tour, well run. We enjoyed visiting all of the sites and the guide was very informative. Would recommend this to others..

reviews.title: The tour was super and Martin was an outstanding guide
reviews.text: Had never been to Lima and was able to see and understand many of the city’s highlights! The transportation was also very good and timely.

reviews.title: Ideal for first-time visitors
reviews.text: Great way to see the key sights and sites in one day. Guide Alvaro was very helpful and flexible, allowing the group extra time to do things like get money changed or buy water, and knew his history too. Barranco was lovely and the olive trees too.

reviews.title: Best experience with Alvaro!
reviews.text: We went with Alvaro for a one day tour today. Alvaro was a supremely outstanding guide, looked after us super well, and went out of his way to take special photos, as well as helping us find Peruvian products we wanted to buy. Truly outstanding 10 star ⭐️ guide! Super highly recommended!Many thanks Alvaro, you are the best guide!!

reviews.title: Tour lima
reviews.text: Excellent tour, service on schedules, dry guides, very friendly and at all times giving us lots of information, 100% recommended

reviews.title: Lima in 1 day! Recommended
reviews.text: Nice visit to the city. Recommended service to get to know Lima and its main attractions in 1 day. Local guides knowledgeable about their history and culture.

reviews.title: Excellent city tour
reviews.text: A great city tour.  We visited the highlights of Lima downtown.  I really enjoyed Mayrol's explanation.
